sections.heading: Estrays, trespassing animals; damages; liability
sections.text: The owners of cattle, horses, mules, swine, sheep, and goats in this state are liable for all damages done by such stock upon the lands of another in this state as provided by section 54-402 if the damages to the lands are not the result of negligent

sections.heading: not applicable to uncultivated, unenclosed wild prairie lands of state. Delaney v. Errickson, 10 Neb. 492, 6 N.W. 600 (1880).
sections.text: not applicable to uncultivated, unenclosed wild prairie lands of state. Delaney v. Errickson, 10 Neb. 492, 6 N.W. 600 (1880).
